üéØ Purpose

The Web Panel is the primary touchpoint for every INTERLINK‚Ñ¢ module. It brings AI messaging, memory visualization, ingestion, automation, and health dashboards into one cohesive workspace.

  • ‚Ä¢ Unified interface for all system modules
  • ‚Ä¢ Real-time feedback loops via REST + WebSocket
  • ‚Ä¢ Optimized for observability, speed, and reliability
  • ‚Ä¢ Designed for GitHub Pages, localhost, or offline deployments

üß± Architecture

Simple, flat structure to keep the panel lightweight and auditable.

frontend/
  index.html
  assets/
  pages/
  css/
  js/

Assets include the 3D logo, shared styles, and per-page modules for navigation, chat, and streaming.

üîå Communication Layer

REST endpoints handle mutations while WebSockets deliver live responses and event streams.

REST API

  • ‚Ä¢ POST /api/send
  • ‚Ä¢ POST /api/ingest
  • ‚Ä¢ POST /api/memory

WebSocket

  • ‚Ä¢ ws://localhost:8000/ws
  • ‚Ä¢ Universal message format from Router-Core
  • ‚Ä¢ Connection + disconnect lifecycle helpers
  • ‚Ä¢ Event streaming for chat, ingest, and logs

‚ú® Feature Panels

AI Chat Interface

Left-aligned conversation history with right-rail model selector and live token counter.

File Ingest

Drag-and-drop uploader for PDFs, text, and URLs with real-time progress logs.

Memory Search

Semantic search with rich result previews and quick links to embeddings.

Automation

Trigger background tasks, monitor logs, and manage workspace permissions.

System Dashboard

Health checks, storage usage, workspace browser, and error monitor in one view.

üé® Design Language

Dark-mode, enterprise aesthetic with smooth transitions and responsive layouts.

  • ‚Ä¢ Background #0A0A0A, text #FFFFFF, accent #3FEAFF
  • ‚Ä¢ Rounded corners and focus states for every control
  • ‚Ä¢ Animated 3D logo (only animation in the UI)
  • ‚Ä¢ Mobile-first responsiveness across all panels
  • ‚Ä¢ No WebGL dependencies for reliability

üíª Script Layer

/js/app.js

Handles model selection, sending messages, receiving streaming responses, and updating the UI.

/js/websocket.js

Manages WebSocket lifecycle, connection states, and resilient reconnects.

/js/router.js

Enables single-page navigation and smooth transitions between panels.

Message Format

All payloads follow the Router-Core universal schema, keeping agents, ingest, and memory consistent.

üß© Page Structure

Core entry points include hero, features, invest, and contact pages, each backed by shared assets.

  • ‚Ä¢ Hero landing with animated logo + Start Session CTA
  • ‚Ä¢ Modular pages inside /pages
  • ‚Ä¢ Shared styles in /css/style.css

üö¶ Operations

Production-ready for GitHub Pages, local installs, and isolated enterprise environments with no external dependencies.

  • ‚Ä¢ Works offline with bundled assets
  • ‚Ä¢ Compatible with air-gapped sovereign deployments
  • ‚Ä¢ Simple static hosting footprint

üèÅ Summary

Frontend-Core keeps INTERLINK‚Ñ¢ operable from any browser: clean, fast, responsive, and modular with full WebSocket streaming.
